local_intent: Execute contact-based lowering to secure a top grasp on the white plate, close the gripper, verify stability, and lift to a safe standoff.
assumptions: White plate is within sensor/arm reach and detectable
Gripper is open prior to lowering
Camera and force sensing are operational for contact detection
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT grasp phase: perceives the white plate, approaches and aligns, lowers until contact (active leaf), closes gripper, verifies grasp stability, and liftsâ€”matching the GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION stepwise plan and success criteria.
